directory.name: Grassroots Books
directory.ad_text: Book lover’s paradise: Everything is 99¢ or less in our Outside Sale. And every Sunday, you can fill a bag for $4.99. We add new inventory every day, and kick-off every Tuesday with all fresh stock.

directory.name: Sierra Trading Post
directory.ad_text: Sierra offers the top brands for an active and outdoor lifestyle, with a vast selection of products for men, women, children & pets at amazing savings.

directory.name: Orange Pedal Reno
directory.address: 1185 California Avenue, Suite H, Reno, NV 89509
directory.ad_text: We are family owned and operated proudly serving all types of cyclists, including new and veteran riders, road, mountain, CX, gravel aficionados, or recreation and transportation cyclists.
